cast.original_title: The Conjuring: The Devil Made Me Do It
cast.overview: Paranormal investigators Ed and Lorraine Warren encounter what would become one of the most sensational cases from their files. The fight for the soul of a young boy takes them beyond anything they'd ever seen before, to mark the first time in U.S. history that a murder suspect would claim demonic possession as a defense.
cast.title: The Conjuring: The Devil Made Me Do It

details.biography: Sarah Catherine Hook is an American actress and singer. Born and raised in Montgomery, AL, she went on to SUNY Purchase College to pursue a degree in Vocal Performance: Opera where she received her Bachelor of Music. During her time at Purchase, she began to pique her interest in acting and attended the Atlantic Theater Company Summer Intensive. Since then, she has continued to take both acting and singing courses around New York. Sarah Catherine is known for The Conjuring 3, Law & Order: SVU, and Living in Harmony Sodastream.
details.name: Sarah Catherine Hook
